1.title: The Biggest Mistake
1.plot: Same-sex couple Angel and Kevin have their engagement derailed by a shocking indiscretion, while Bradley and Shanice, an interracial couple, learn they need parental consent from his disapproving mother in order to marry.

2.title: This Wedding Is Not Valid!
2.plot: Jurnee and Don are cut-off financially by parents who declare they haven't earned the maturity to marry. Meanwhile, Bradley's mother boldly disrupts their wedding ceremony, leaving Shanice in tears at the altar.

3.title: Marry Me Now or Never
3.plot: Nick and Cailyn's engagement implodes after Nick's mom learns they have set a wedding date without her knowledge. Don and Jurnee threaten to call off their engagement the night before the wedding.

4.title: Will Love Keep Us Together
4.plot: When Nick's mother discovers the couple has been planning their wedding ceremony behind her back, it sets off an emotional firestorm between future in-laws that leaves the couple's future together in limbo.

imdb.plot outline: Oxygen Media takes an inside look at what happens when young lovers decide they can't live without each other in an emotional four part special event "Too Young To Marry?". This heart-filled special follows opinionated teen couples who are determined to walk down the aisle with or without the blessing of their family and friends. With parents threatening to disown them, siblings accusing them of making the biggest mistake of their lives and friends pulling them in opposite directions, these young lovers must battle the odds to prove that age is just a number and love is all that matters.
